mapper.select: select declare_account,id from tax_fc_task_sub_proof where 1 = 1 -- and status = "00" and is_active = 1 and task_main_proof_id = #{mainId} order by created_time desc

select tsp.id, tsp.task_no, tmp.manager_no, tmp.manager_name, tsp.declare_account, tsp.period, tsp.headcount, tsp.chinese_num, tsp.foreigner_num, tsp.`status`, tsp.task_type, tsp.is_combined from tax_fc_task_sub_proof tsp left join tax_fc_task_main_proof tmp on tsp.task_main_proof_id = tmp.id where tsp.is_active = 1 and tsp.`status` <> '00' and tsp.`status` <> '02' and tsp.task_sub_proof_id is null
and tmp.manager_name LIKE concat('%', #{managerName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and tsp.declare_account LIKE concat('%', #{declareAccount, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and date(tsp.period) = date(#{period,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
and tsp.`status` = #{status}
and tsp.task_type = #{taskType}
order by tsp.created_time desc
select id from tax_fc_task_sub_proof where task_sub_proof_id in (#{sbCombinedParams})
mapper.update: update tax_fc_task_sub_proof set is_active = false WHERE id in (#{sbCombinedParams})
update tax_fc_task_sub_proof set task_sub_proof_id = null,modified_by = #{modifiedBy} WHERE is_active = 1 AND task_sub_proof_id = #{id}
mapper.select: select tsp.id, tsp.task_no, tmp.manager_no, tmp.manager_name, tsp.declare_account, tsp.period, tsp.headcount, tsp.chinese_num, tsp.foreigner_num, tsp.`status`, tsp.task_type, tsp.is_combined from tax_fc_task_sub_proof tsp left join tax_fc_task_main_proof tmp on tsp.task_main_proof_id = tmp.id where tsp.is_active = 1 and tsp.id = #{subProofId}
